Text.val: -- Enable display (in job journal) the totla number of selected/handled rows

SQL_STMT_U.val: select DRIH_DEBH_NO, DRIH_ADMNO, DRIH_CLNTNO, (select max(b.DRIH_DATSTARTING) from :1/DRIH b where b.DRIH_REINSURANCETYPE = 1 and b.DRIH_DATSTARTING <= ':2' and (b.DRIH_REINSURANCELIMITEXPIRY > ':2' or b.DRIH_REINSURANCELIMITEXPIRY is null) and b.DRIH_DEBH_NO = a.DRIH_DEBH_NO and b.DRIH_ADMNO = a.DRIH_ADMNO and b.DRIH_CLNTNO = a.DRIH_CLNTNO) from :1/DRIH a where DRIH_REINSURANCETYPE = 1 and DRIH_DATSTARTING <= ':2' and (DRIH_REINSURANCELIMITEXPIRY > ':2' or DRIH_REINSURANCELIMITEXPIRY is null) and DRIH_ADMNO <>0 and DRIH_CLNTNO <>0 group by DRIH_DEBH_NO, DRIH_ADMNO, DRIH_CLNTNO order by DRIH_DEBH_NO, DRIH_ADMNO, DRIH_CLNTNO

ExpSyntax.val: 'DEBH_LEGALOWNER_DEBH = '&Trim (Str ({0,3},'9'))&' and DEBH_DATDELETED is null'&' and INVO_DUEDATE between '&ASCIIChr(39)&DStr({0,9},'YYYY-MM-DD')&ASCIIChr(39)&' and '&ASCIIChr(39)&DStr({0,10},'YYYY-MM-DD')&ASCIIChr(39)

Text.val: -- Step 4: Present selected invoices in MQ286
